info.title: plentymarkets REST-API
info.description: The plentymarkets REST API expands the functionality of the plentymarkets CMS and allows access to resources, i.e. data records, via unique URI paths

get.description: Gets the URL to login as the given contact. The ID of the contact must be specified.

401.description: The resource owner or authorization server denied the request. - The request is missing a required parameter, includes an invalid parameter value, includes a parameter more than once, or is otherwise malformed. Check the "access token" parameter.

post.description: Create an trolley tag for a pick list.

401.description: The resource owner or authorization server denied the request. - The request is missing a required parameter, includes an invalid parameter value, includes a parameter more than once, or is otherwise malformed. Check the "access token" parameter.

delete.description: Delete an trolley tag for a pick list.

401.description: The resource owner or authorization server denied the request. - The request is missing a required parameter, includes an invalid parameter value, includes a parameter more than once, or is otherwise malformed. Check the "access token" parameter.

parameters.name: trolleyTag
parameters.description: The trolley tag for the pick list

delete.summary: Revert outgoing stock for order items
delete.description: DEPRECATED: Use the following route: POST /rest/{orderType}/{orderId}/cancel_booking Reverts the booking of the given order items of an order. The order items have to be specified.

401.description: The resource owner or authorization server denied the request. - The request is missing a required parameter, includes an invalid parameter value, includes a parameter more than once, or is otherwise malformed. Check the "access token" parameter.

id.description: The Id of the order item to be booked back in.

warehouseId.description: The Id of the warehouse, where the quantity should be booked back in. optional

quantity.description: The quantity for this order item to be booked back in. optional

batch.description: [optional] The batch for this order item, to be booked back in. optional

bestBeforeDate.description: [optional] The best before date for this order item, to be booked back in. optional

reasonId.description:
[optional] The Id of the reason, why the quantity for this order item should be booked back in.
Possible values are one of the following: optional

delete.description: Deletes an order item. The ID of the order and the ID of the order item must be specified.

401.description: The resource owner or authorization server denied the request. - The request is missing a required parameter, includes an invalid parameter value, includes a parameter more than once, or is otherwise malformed. Check the "access token" parameter.

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: The ID of the order that the item belongs to.

parameters.name: orderItemId
parameters.description: The ID of the order item to be deleted.

delete.description: DEPRECATED: Use the following route: POST /rest/{orderType}/{orderId}/cancel_booking Cancellation the booking of an order. The ID of the order must be specified.

401.description: The resource owner or authorization server denied the request. - The request is missing a required parameter, includes an invalid parameter value, includes a parameter more than once, or is otherwise malformed. Check the "access token" parameter.

post.description: DEPRECATED: Use the following route: POST /rest/{orderType}/{orderId}/book Books out the order items of an order. The ID of the order must be specified and a booking date can be specified. The current date and time will be used if no date is specified.

401.description: The resource owner or authorization server denied the request. - The request is missing a required parameter, includes an invalid parameter value, includes a parameter more than once, or is otherwise malformed. Check the "access token" parameter.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date that is saved as booking date for the outgoing stock.

delete.description: Deletes multiple translation. The pluginSetId and languageCode must be specified.

401.description: The resource owner or authorization server denied the request. - The request is missing a required parameter, includes an invalid parameter value, includes a parameter more than once, or is otherwise malformed. Check the "access token" parameter.

parameters.name: $pluginSetId
parameters.description: The ID of the plugin set

get.summary: Get surcharge types from module configuration
get.description: Gets surcharge types from module configuration.

401.description: The resource owner or authorization server denied the request. - The request is missing a required parameter, includes an invalid parameter value, includes a parameter more than once, or is otherwise malformed. Check the "access token" parameter.

get.summary: Get group types from module configuration
get.description: Gets group types from module configuration.

401.description: The resource owner or authorization server denied the request. - The request is missing a required parameter, includes an invalid parameter value, includes a parameter more than once, or is otherwise malformed. Check the "access token" parameter.

200.description: This call does not have a response output.

401.description: This call does not have an error output.

email.description: The email address associated with the My account area.

password.description: The password associated with the My account area.

post.description: Make a plugin visible or invisible on plentyMarketplace.

403.description: There is no plugin associated with the given item ID on plentyMarketplace.

plentyID.description: ID of the plentymarkets system used for uploading the plugin.

itemId.description: ID of the plugin on plentyMarketplace.

isActive.description: Set to true to make the plugin visible on plentyMarketplace. Set to false to make it invisible.
